name: Chased the Rainbow
description:
A text adventure game made in one night about a colorful nightmare.

This was made on Twine for Weekly Rainbow Jam - Week 2

Theme: Lose to Win

Follow the rainbow! You might find a pot of gold. Or don't if you don't want to. You can start and then stop whenever you want. In fact, it might be better to quit while you're ahead.

Features:

  • Simple but colorful art!
  • 8 endings to unlock!
  • A currency system that currently has no use! 

Changelog:

  1. 6/13: Added an option in Game Statistics to delete your progress so that, if you get locked out of an ending, you're not locked out forever.
